page.title: 13Whittington Castle Fayre
page.content: {Whittington Castle Fayre}is held at Whittington Castle once a year in July.A few weeks before the fayre the Brownies and Guides get together to vote for the queen and the attendants to go on the float from Drenewydd to the Castle. At the Fayre there are many activities like fancy dress,drawing and photographic competitions. There is a coconut shy and many organisations have their own stalls.There are also entertainments.Last year there was Gymnastic display by the Wrexham Olympians and some girls from Whittington School gave a dancing display.Every year we have a raffle and the first three tickets win prizes.This year's theme is International.
